doctor.name: Dr. Surozit Sarkar Titas
doctor.workplace: Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Surozit Sarkar Titas is a Hematologist in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS, MD (Hematology). He is a Assistant Professor & Head, Hepatology at Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Dr. Surozit Sarkar Titas at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra is 3:30pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: House # 12/310, Thanthania Bus Stand, Sherpur Road, Bogura
